title: Turok 2 Seeds of Evil playthrough -- Part 3
description: This game is confusing as af but it's still coo imo.

I know where you need to go
Where you got the eagle feather, remember you got to that section with all the water falls
You went down them, and shot a switch, then went through a teleporter
There's an underwater path that opened when you shot the switch
Yeah, progression is through the waterfall hole area with the floating platforms.
I think you need to take the the drop down to the lower level again
You're on the right path now
Yep, it's just a little further that way
Drop down the hole in the water
Ok, now you'll go down these waterfalls -- you shot a switch underwater here that opened an underwater tunnel
Phew, ok cool, you're back on the main path again
I'll let you continue blind once more!
To be fair, at that point you needed to back track anyways to use your feather. The fact that you have lava swimming is going to be helpful for the rest of the level
